footer.copyright_leading: Content is generated by AI and is for reference only

extract_key.title: Life
extract_key.content: The breeze in the mountains gently caresses my face, bringing the fragrance of the soil. Recalling an ancient saying: 'One flower, one world; one leaf, one bodhi.' This makes me understand that every small existence in life is worth cherishing.

extract_key.title: Life
extract_key.content: The breeze in the mountains gently caresses my face, bringing the fragrance of the soil. Recalling an ancient saying: 'One flower, one world; one leaf, one bodhi.' This makes me understand that every small existence in life is worth cherishing.

extract_key.title: Breakthrough
extract_key.content: Evening in the fields, waves of rice rolling. I remember my grandfather saying: 'A seed must experience darkness before it can break through the soil.' This tells us that growth is inevitably accompanied by challenges and breakthroughs.

extract_key.title: Inclusiveness
extract_key.content: Standing by the sea watching the tides rise and fall, my heart is incredibly peaceful. The ancients said: 'The sea embraces all rivers; greatness lies in capacity.' This inspires us to face life with an open mind, embracing and accepting different people and things.

extract_key.title: Inclusiveness
extract_key.content: Standing by the sea watching the tides rise and fall, my heart is incredibly peaceful. The ancients said: 'The sea embraces all rivers; greatness lies in capacity.' This inspires us to face life with an open mind, embracing and accepting different people and things.

extract_key.title: Courage
extract_key.content: Walking in the dawn, dewdrops crystal clear. Someone once said: 'Life will not shortchange anyone who strives upward.' This gave me the courage to continue forward when facing difficulties.

extract_key.title: Action
extract_key.content: Morning sunlight shines through the window into the room, starting a beautiful day. I remember my master saying: 'The best time to plant a tree was ten years ago, the second best is now.' This made me understand that it's never too late to take action.

extract_key.title: Limitation
extract_key.content: Standing on the mountaintop looking into the distance, the sea of clouds rolling magnificently. Zhuangzi said: 'A frog in a well cannot discuss the ocean; a summer insect cannot discuss ice.' Reminding us to broaden our horizons and break through limitations.

extract_key.title: Test
extract_key.content: Spring rain nourishes the growth of all things. Remember that saying: 'The sharpness of a sword comes from grinding; the fragrance of plum blossoms comes from the bitter cold.' This tells us that success often requires setbacks and tests.

extract_key.title: Cultivation
extract_key.content: Spring breeze on my face, looking at the blooming flowers in the yard. The elder often said: 'You reap what you sow.' Every effort in life will bloom and bear fruit at some point in the future.

extract_key.title: Life
extract_key.content: The air after rain is especially fresh, making one feel carefree. There's a good saying: 'Life is like a book, the foolish flip through it casually, the wise read it carefully.' This teaches us to feel the beauty of life with our hearts.

extract_key.title: Adversity
extract_key.content: Walking on the forest path in autumn, leaves falling. Recalling that saying: 'Without experiencing the bone-chilling cold, how can one smell the fragrance of plum blossoms?' The most beautiful scenery in life is often seen after experiencing adversity.

extract_key.title: Ideal
extract_key.content: Sitting in the study reading, birds chirping happily outside the window. Su Shi said: 'Those who accomplish great things in ancient times not only had extraordinary talent but also unshakable determination.' This encourages me never to give up in pursuing my ideals.

extract_key.title: Strength
extract_key.content: As night falls, the city's neon lights flicker. Remember that saying: 'Nine out of ten things in life don't go as wished; I hope you become strong enough not to need to pour out your grievances.' This teaches us to learn to stay strong in adversity and continue moving forward.
